post.text: "You want to give me a good send off? Go vote!" —President Obama hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Eric
comment.text: When all of your children are being raped and beheaded, I am going to sit back in a lawn chair and enjoy the show. Just remember you all wanted it...
